text: It will be launched by President Maithripala Sirisena and Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe.Vision 2025 A Rich Country, the Economic Development Plan of the government for the next eight years will be unveiled today (4th Sept.) 3.00 p.m. at the BMICH. It will be launched by President Maithripala Sirisena and Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe.
title: President, PM to unveil 'Vision-2025' today
